sServerTab0: Only PVE is allowed. Except AI enemies
The same goes for any item
Do not litter at trader zones
sServerTab1: There's no limit regarding base size
Military Zones (ex. Tissy, Green Mtn military base, Kamensk)
Trader zones. Building is allowed 1.2km away from any trader
sServerTab2: Everyone could be wrong at any time even Admin
The server is trying to be as friendly as it could go
If something goes wrong with server for example missing trader items please reach out to me on Discord
